children.subject:
Hi there, good question!

Unfortunately, due to limited spots available in the course as well as the fast-paced nature of our content, all students must be able to attend lectures live in order to enroll.


However, WDB runs an active YouTube channel where all of our past and future lectures are posted, so if you want to access the content there, feel free to. We also post our past course homeworks and projects here.

Also, the course will be running every semester, so you can always enroll in future semesters!
Are DeCal lectured recorded? I have a time conflict with another class but I'd still want to take this DeCal.
May I know where is " Physics 1 Classroom"?

history.content:
Web Development at Berkeley is recruiting! Don't miss your chance to join one of UC Berkeley's most exciting and vibrant tech communities.

WDB is UC Berkeley's first web development and design-centered organization, bringing full-stack web development and design education and hands-on industry development and design experience to our members.

We also run a DeCal, Introduction to Full Stack Development, for those of you who are looking to get a start in your web development journeys in a fun, safe, and inviting environment. Our course is open to all experience levels!

Whether you are interested in joining the club or taking the DeCal, we will have two info-sessions for each and an initial written application that you will fill out.

Applications are open NOW at https://webatberkeley.org/join for the club and https://fullstackdecal.com/ for the DeCal!

If you are interested in the club:

  • Attend our infosessions to learn more about what we do as a club!
    • WDB Infosession 1 @ Zoom on 1/25 (Tuesday) 7-8 PM PST
    • WDB Infosession 2 @ Zoom on 1/27 (Thursday) 7-8 PM PST
    • Our application is open NOW at https://webatberkeley.org/join Due date: 1/28 (Friday) by 11:59 PM PST!

If you are interested in the DeCal:

  • Attend our infosessions to learn even more and have the chance to talk to the course staff!
    • DeCal Infosession 1 @ Zoom on 1/24 (Monday) 7-8 PM PST
    • DeCal Infosession 2 @ Zoom on 1/26 (Wednesday) 7-8 PM PST
    • Our application is open NOW at https://fullstackdecal.com/ Due date: 1/30 (Sunday) by 11:59 PM PST!

In the meantime, use this link to follow us on our socials and access all other links including Coffee Chat Signups, Interest Form, Recruiting Discord, and much more!

We look forward to seeing what you all have to offer and are excited to read through your applications. Good luck, and go bears!
history.subject: Join Web Development at Berkeley!
